# The `PluginChain` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A plugin-based class that takes an arbitrary number of Plugin types. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;class... Ts&gt;
class anonymous_namespace{ValueProfileCollector.cpp}::PluginChain&lt;Ts&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A plugin-based class that takes an arbitrary number of Plugin types.

Each plugin type must satisfy the following API: 1) the constructor must take a <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;f</code>. Typically, the plugin would scan the function looking for candidates. 2) contain a member function with the following signature and name: void run(std::vector&lt;CandidateInfo&gt; &amp;Candidates); such that the plugin would append its result into the vector parameter.

Plugins are defined in <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/instrumentation/valueprofileplugins-inc">ValueProfilePlugins.inc</a>

Definition at line 30 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/instrumentation/valueprofilecollector-cpp">ValueProfileCollector.cpp</a>.

</DoxygenPage>
